description:
This is it! Famo.us arrived in Belgium. Let's meet very soon and start building things together. 

First, make sure to register on famo.us website to get access to Famo.us University. 

Famo.us University is an online IDE that will help you start with Famo.us without having to install anything! Just open your browser and start coding! Pretty sweet! 

Make sure to go through the basics of Famo.us then we will spend more time building apps. But if you feel stuck don't worry, we've got your back! Just come over and we'll figure out together! 

If you feel comfortable with Famo.us or any other JavaScript Frameworks then join me to help other people get better at it! Deal?

Looking forward to seeing you all and don't forget that the best way to get better is by getting your hands dirty!
name: Let's meet up and start building things together!

description:
Let's meet up and build a simple mobile application using Famo.us. We'll have a quick tour of Famo.us University then we'll build a twitter client slicker than the real twitter app. Then we'll deploy our app on phones (iOS and Android) using Cordova/PhoneGap.

If anyone wants to demo what he built so far, drop me an email at [masked].

Hope to see you all very soon.
Have a great weekend.

Cheers,

Davy Engone
name: Introduction To Famo.us.

description:
Here we go again for our famo.us meetup.

During this session we will learn everything you need to know to get started with that library. From surfaces, to layout components, you will get a deep introduction to famo.us.

This time you should bring your computer along with you to actually learn by doing. We will build a simple mobile and deploy it on android and iOS using Cordova.

I'll introduce you to famous/angular which has been built by Zach Brown from ThomasStreet in San Francisco with the sponsor of Famo.us Industry! So if you have experience using AngularJS then you'll be happy to see how easy It is to get the power of the two combine!

Don't forget your computer!! :)

This meetup is kindly hosted by Mediahuis in Antwerp. Thanks to Heino Schaght!
name: Getting Started with Famo.us

description:
Hey hackers,

Let's dig into some more advanced concepts in Famo.us. We will be using Famo.us along side Angular to build an application. We will show you how to architect your application using AngularJS so a little exposure to AngularJS is needed.

We will wrap our app using cordova and deploy it on Android and iOS.

This is a real hands-on session so don't expect a lot of slides but do expect to write a bit of code ( a lot actually) so join us and let's have fun together.
Best,

@philos_io team
name: Design, Build and deploy a famo.us app

description:
Hey people, we're going to the north-west of Belgium for this meetup!

For those that can't attend the famo.us meetup in Brussels or Antwerp, we're going to spend the evening of the 27th of November in Kortrijk hacking on Famous!

We will be starting with an introduction of this amazing tool then we will be diving into famous and AngularJS integration. Later we will use cordova and ngCordova especially to wrap and deploy our app on Android and iOS.

Bring your computer and our host will be providing food and drinks.

Thanks to Stackandheap and Thijs for hosting this event! Let's make it happen!
Best,

@philos_io team
name: Famous meetup: Kortrijk edition
